channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Lemon garlic chicken orzo soup
item.description:
Lemon garlic chicken orzo soup



Inspired by Greek “Avgolemono”, this Lemon Garlic Chicken Orzo Soup recipe is thickened with a mixture of lemon juice, pureed garlic, and egg to create a flavor-packed, citrusy, velvety soup..

item.title: Slow cooker butter chicken
item.description:
Slow cooker butter chicken



Not every version of butter chicken uses butter. Coconut milk gives this slow-cooker chicken its creamy richness..

item.title: Sweet and sour tofu stir fry
item.description:
Sweet and sour tofu stir fry



The sweet and sour stir fry has become a very well known westernized Cantonese dish, which is especially popular when ordering take-out. It is quick and very easy to make, so especially good after a long and busy day..

item.title: Citrus-spiced salmon
item.description:
Citrus-spiced salmon



Salmon is a great fish to spice up. Its oily nature an robust flavour allow it to hold spicing and gutsy marinades well without being overpowered, ad the spice mix for this dish is really quite bold..
